# ci-failure-triage

Diagnose CI failures and stabilize pipelines. Use when a mid-level developer needs to resolve flaky or failing builds.

## Quick Facts
- id: `ci-failure-triage--9c9b50c9a6`
- worth_using_score: `20/100`
- tags: `ci`
- source: `agent_playground`
- source_path: `/home/wolvend/codex/agent_playground/source/agents/frameworks/Spinnybot/skills-selected/ci-failure-triage/SKILL.md`

## Workflow / Steps
- Classify failures by stage and error type.
- Check for environment changes and test flakiness.
- Propose fixes and temporary mitigations.
